response.body: {"url":"{{{request.url}}}","path":"{{{request.path}}}","pathIndex":"{{{request.path.[1]}}}","param":"{{{request.query.foo.[0]}}}","paramIndex":"{{{request.query.foo.[1]}}}","authorization":"{{{request.headers.Authorization.[0]}}}","authorization2":"{{{request.headers.Authorization.[1]}}}","fullBody":"{{{escapejsonbody}}}","responseFoo":"{{{jsonPath request.body '$.foo'}}}","responseBaz":{{{jsonPath request.body '$.baz'}}} ,"responseBaz2":"Bla bla {{{jsonPath request.body '$.foo'}}} bla bla"}
